comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I'm planning to be there today unless all hell breaks loose between now and then--a very real possibility these days.

comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: I didn't know I had a typical fashion. I had a meeting that went until a little after noon, so I couldn't meet you all at 12:05. As for going the opposite direction, it makes for a better ride. By extending the route east to 95th, coming back on Valmont and taking the boulder creek path back to campus, I avoid most of the traffic and get in a pretty good ride (19 mile-ish).

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Did I ride Flag today? I don't recall... I may have, but I'm not sure. Was it hot? I can't recall now. It may have been, but now I'm not so sure. Did I go all the way to the top? I really can't recall at this point in time. Did I take a dip in Boulder Creek after the alleged ride? I can't remember... It's hard to recall now. Can you repeat the question? (Sorry Frenz, but I hear there's an opening in the Attorny General's office and I'm just practicing for the interview. Wish me luck!)
